programme.title: JAG: Pilot, Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: A woman radar-intercept officer (RIO) disappears at night from an aircraft carrier in the Adriatic Sea. Two JAG lawyers, Lt. Harm Rabb and Lt. Caitlin Pike, investigate and solve. Harm, a former Naval aviator, unexpectedly becomes a hero.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shadow
programme.desc: A civilian tech rep aboard a submarine seizes control of an experimental torpedo after its launch during an exercise.(n)

programme.title: JAG: déjà vu (AKA Soldier of Love)
programme.desc: Three Navy lieutenants die by homicide in 11 months around Washington. Harm and Meg investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Desert Son
programme.desc: Due to a human error in an exercise, artillery fire injures seven Marines, one of whom later dies.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Area 51
programme.desc: To help fund Walter's research into saving his sister's life, Team Scorpion takes a lucrative job for the CIA to find a top-secret aircraft in the mysterious Area 51.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: US vs. UN vs. UK
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is blackmailed to break into the United Nations to assist in the assassination of a menacing arms dealer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Arrivals And Departures
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion and Walter's parents visit Megan in the hospital as her health deteriorates, they are quarantined after a deadly fungus outbreak threatens to infect everyone.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Old College Try
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover at a university to find a hacker who infiltrates the Federal Reserve and threatens to collapse the world economy.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dam Breakthrough
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Team Scorpion must prevent a catastrophe when torrential rains create a large crack in a dam, threatening to wipe out an entire town in its wake.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: White Out
programme.desc: In order to save a United States Special Forces unit from certain death, Team Scorpion must brave the subzero temperatures of Antarctica.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit this deserted old mansion which is way past its original splendour. They are soon surrounded by unexplained activity as something is following them and for at least two members of crew, they are pushed to their very limits.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to the mysterious Guys Cliffe House, once a private dwelling, it is now home to the Fraternal Brotherhood of Freemasons. The team are followed by a very persistent poltergeist that will seem to stop at nothing to get their attention.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: From the start activity prevalent in this historical building. Glen is faced with something unexplained early on, Gregg is faced with his most demanding vigil yet and the rest of team chase a sinister shadow that lurks in the dark corridor.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation, moving from the cellar to the upper floors. While Yvette and Glen explore the auditorium, something follows Karl upstairs, and the rest of the team captures some of their best evidence yet.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: An all but deserted manor house that boasts murder, death and intrigue among its history becomes the setting for one of the most intriguing investigation to date. The team are showered with object that appear to land in the same way.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Soldier's Story
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Tapsheads to Derby, Connecticut to investigate one of the country's oldest Opera houses, the Sterling Opera House.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost Friends Forever
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Little Rock, Arkansas where a family has inherited a bungalow, next door to their home, that they believe to be cursed.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Inn of the Dead
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Cape Cod to investigate the Orleans Inn. Some of the claims here are that candles light on their own, glasses slide off tables, and hauntings by two separate men who hung themselves.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 9
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Chopping Block
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS returns to Mansfield, Ohio to investigate the Bissman Building, where the current manager, Ellis Byrd, was nearly choked to death by a black mist.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Chaos and the Stillness of It

programme.desc: Dylan, Rhade and Beka work together to rescue Trance from Methus-2 and Harper from General Burma.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: After being left stranded near a black hole, Captain Dylan Hunt is discovered by a mercenary salvage ship and finds he has been frozen in time for 300 years.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.176
programme.desc: Single mother bails Internet acquaintance out of jail, discovers he has girlfriend and baby. He countersues, alleging she stalked him. Angry neighbor smashes deliveryman's car window with lawn chair for driving too fast.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.237
programme.desc: A 'doctored' contract complicates a case about a ruined wedding reception due to heat. Feuding teenagers and parents battle over liability in a wrecked car incident after a night of drinking.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.4
programme.desc: Pounding on and damaging a car in a fit of rage is a claim denied by\t\t\t\r\na teenager accused of vandalism by his ex-girlfriend/A man sues his ex-girlfriend for payments and damages to a car he was letting her borrow.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.7
programme.desc: Unwed parents fight over jail time, restraining order, and engagement ring/Man sues friend for used motorcycle balance; friend alleges lemon.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.77
programme.desc: A 16-year-old claims a schoolmate keyed her car; the accused classmate denies all charges/A 12-year-old girl, who is entrusted with a valuable Rolex chain, makes the mistake of loaning it to a classmate; he claims he lost it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.16
programme.desc: An attempt to serve divorce papers to a man and his new girlfriend allegedly ends in an act of vandalism and assault.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.167
programme.desc: Woman claims ex-husband owes $16k in child support arrears; he sues for overpayment. Man sues alleged bar assailant; defendant claims Good Samaritan role.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.146
programme.desc: A man denies popping the tires and smashing the truck windows of his ex-girlfriend’s new boyfriend’s vehicle in a jealous rampage.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers accuse each other of having drug problems during a fight over an alleged loan for a motorcycle.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.24
programme.desc: Babysitter accused of falsely claiming ex-employer smoked marijuana in front of child/Gallery owner denies scamming customer, claims heirloom sapphire sold for alleged ten dollars.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.177
programme.desc: Woman's front teeth cracked when intoxicated dancer trips and knocks into her at bar. Dancer denies wrongdoing. 15-year-old accused of breaking pizzeria window denies involvement but refuses to implicate friend. Police provide different account.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.210
programme.desc: Unwed parents fight over the return of furniture, an unpaid cell phone bill, and an incarcerated ex-boyfriend.\t\t\t\r\nA landlord is suing a former tenant for damage to her rental property.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: El Prisionero
programme.desc: Lou and his cousin Rob face trouble on the job when a debtor makes shocking claims to police about the newest member of the Pizarro clan. Plus, will a repossession from a well-connected socialite end with Matt and Froy riding into the sunset?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Showdown
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for a typical vehicle repossession.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: What the Truck?!?
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for typical vehicle repossession...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Contact
programme.desc: The repo team is back! On the premiere episode of the summer season of Operation Repo, Lou, Matt, Sonia, Froy, and Lyndah are back together and better than ever...although a secret meeting suggests trouble in paradise. This week, the team confronts...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Crush
programme.desc: Lou faces the toughest loss of his career. First, the team repossesses a truck from a pair of larger-than-life debtors with a passion for exotic sports, then they grapple with a gaggle of drunken partiers who don't want to give up their tricked-out bus.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Junior Partner
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride, Matt and Lyndah attempt to repo..(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: The confusion over Lou's new business relationship with Matt continues to mount. Matt and Froy find themselves in a nice neighborhood on a mission to repossess a security car from the world's most bumbling guards, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt hit the docks.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: New Truck Day
programme.desc: The repo team's new truck finally arrives, and with it, a new chapter in the building feud between Team Lou and Team Matt.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting
programme.desc: On the advice of Russell, Jack's flirtation with a colleague at work reveals that she's more than happy to have an affair. Russell, realizing he left his phone at the home of a one-night stand, sends Timmy to find it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Four Pillars
programme.desc: To make Audrey happy, Jeff begrudgingly agrees to see a couple's therapist. Meanwhile, Russell develops a crush on Timmy's fiancé.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Audrey is upset when Jeff reveals to her that he does not believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost. Meanwhile, Russell tries to persuade Timmy not to go through with his arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Indian Giver
programme.desc: Audrey is surprised by Jeff's sudden interest in her favorite reality show until she discovers the reason. Meanwhile, to Russell's delight, Timmy has second thoughts about his impending arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 3rd Wheel
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Jeff, Audrey lies to her homely friend Liz that she is on Jeff's list of women he would sleep with if Audrey were not around.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Snoozin' For A Bruisin'
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally rolls over and clocks Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Free Free Time
programme.desc: When Audrey's weekly girls' night out is canceled, Jeff seeks out time alone; however, his plans are foiled every step of the way. Meanwhile, Russell discovers that Timmy has a lot of pent-up aggression toward him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Score
programme.desc: Jeff spends the evening trying to avoid learning the score of a Rangers game after Audrey forces him to give up his tickets and go to her boss' party instead. Meanwhile, at the game, Russell is mortified when Timmy roots against the home team.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Atlantic City
programme.desc: Audrey tries to make Jeff feel guilty for not telling her that his friend's bachelor party in Atlantic City was canceled; however, her plan backfires when Jeff discovers that Audrey is also being deceitful.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trouble in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog is back in Hawaii and tracking a dangerous fugitive through the jungles of the Big Island. Their prey is being protected by a ring of family and friends that Dog must forcefully confront to bring in his man.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trouble in Paradise

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: A psychic (Tamlyn Tomita) assisting police with a serial killer investigation "sees'' that a television reporter is really Sam (Scott Bakula), whose task is to save her from being another victim. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) stares into the barrel of a six-gun after leaping into the life of an elderly once-celebrated gunslinger whose former partner (John Anderson) wants his rightful share of glory. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a New Mexico talk show host who, along with his partner (DeLane Matthews), investigates strange occurrences which may be linked to toxic chemicals. With Dean Stockwell. Cameo by Dr. Laura Schlessinger.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The first pump action shotgun - a Winchester Model 1897; a hunter's collection of prize big game, full-body taxidermy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Driller Instinct
programme.desc: Ton & Allen encounter aggressive outdoorsmen in the Alaskan wilderness. The guys discover an 8-wheeled ATV that travels on both land & water and an air percussion hammer that can drill through solid rock!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!(n)
